title: Sulphur Lizard

properties.name: description
properties.value: Sulphur lizards are creatures found in the middle level of the Karuulm Slayer Dungeon in Mount Karuulm, requiring level 44 Slayer to kill. As they are only found within the volcano, players must wear the boots of stone, boots of brimstone or granite boots to protect themselves from the extreme heat of the dungeon floor. Additionally, players that have completed the elite Kourend & Kebos Diary can wear any type of footwear, or no footwear, without being rapidly burned.

Monster ID8614

Sulphur lizards are creatures found in the middle level of the Karuulm Slayer Dungeon in Mount Karuulm, requiring level 44 Slayer to kill. As they are only found within the volcano, players must wear the boots of stone, boots of brimstone or granite boots to protect themselves from the extreme heat of the dungeon floor. Additionally, players that have completed the elite Kourend & Kebos Diary can wear any type of footwear, or no footwear, without being rapidly burned.

Players can kill these as an alternative to desert lizards, provided they have the higher Slayer level. However, sulphur lizards do not require ice coolers to finish off.

Sulphur lizards access the gem drop table fairly frequently, at a rate of 6/128 (~1/21.33), making it a good low-level monster to kill for ironmen players seeking a shield left half or dragon spear.

They can be safespotted by standing by the corner of the entrance to their room. A cannon placed nearby can easily draw the lizards in.

Gem drop table[edit | edit source]

This monster has a 6/128 chance of accessing the gem drop table. When it accesses the gem drop table, there is a 2/3 chance that it rolls the table twice, yielding up to 2 items, and a 1/3 chance that it rolls the table once.
